Name: Sad City 42
About the game: Learn the story of a simple Russian guy Vlad, who became a Master. The Dungeon Master. Vlad lives in Russia, in his country to such people as he treated badly. He wanted to be a good guy, but life was a strange thing and everyone was in the way. This is a story about good and evil, about love and about the relationship between Vlad and the Russian outback. Features: -Original and unique history -Heavy moral choice -Unstandard for visual novellas graphics -Some endings
